client_description_Summary_Note:
The RM has known Hoffmann Scholz Schmitz since childhood, as their families have been close friends for many years. This long-standing relationship has fostered a deep trust and understanding between them.
Hoffmann Scholz Schmitz is a 21 year old and comes from Germany.
After extensive research, he chose Julius Baer for its strong track record in managing high-net-worth clients.
client_description_Family_Background: Hoffmann Scholz Schmitz is currently single. He does not have any children.
client_description_Education_Background: Hoffmann earned his secondary school diploma from Maria-Theresia-Gymnasium München in 2021.
client_description_Occupation_History:
Hoffmann Scholz Schmitz is a 21 year old and comes from Germany.
Hoffmann Scholz Schmitz did not start his professional career yet.
client_description_Wealth_Summary:
He did not manage to save any money during his career.
Client does not have any properties.
Following the passing of his grandmother, a successful Hedge Fund Manager, he received an inheritance of 1900000 EUR in 2017, which he has used to secure his financial future.
client_description_Client_Summary: The RM is looking forward to supporting the client in building a successful career and achieving financial stability.
